title: kassadin top

replies.body:
Tank Kassadin was "popular" for about 2 weeks last season. People started building Iceborn instead of lichbane and loved it.
Not sure about the Nashors though...

{{item:3116}}  is nice since you can Q people to slow them then Ult on them and they can never get away.

He fell out of favour but I still think he's pretty good. Though I do prefer the Full AP (3 hit the carry) build.

yeah im not skilled enough to play the ap carry build as i find his early game to punishing at my bronze skill level lol.

i have ran rylais when i dont run gauntlet and it is pretty damn nice :)

Ive found being tanky the nashors gives good as+ap+20% cdr and the pa ssive of nether blade goes well with nashor's passive
